melee: mwk trident +8 (1d8+6), bite +2 (1d4+2) or 2 claws +7 (1d4+4), bite +7 (1d4+4)
other_gear: mwk trident, mwk underwater heavy crossbow with 20 bolts, feather token (anchor), dagger, thieves' tools, 53 gp
languages: Aquan, Common, Elven; speak with sharks

sections.body: During Combat The scout shoots the appropriate bane bolts before closing to melee.
sections.name: Tactics

name: Sahuagin Scout
skills: Acrobatics +10, Climb +11, Disable Device +12, Escape Artist +10, Knowledge (geography) +7, Perception +8, Ride +7, Sense Motive +8, Stealth +10, Survival +7, Swim +12
combat_gear: +1 elf-bane bolts (3), +1 human-bane bolts (3), +1 merfolk-bane bolts (3), potion of cure moderate wounds
